p:
Aside from race and ethnicity other socio‐economic factors have been shown to worsen outcome with COVID‐19 disease. Nursing Homes and Assisted living facilities have proved to be areas of easy spread with high subsequent morbidity and mortality. Both inmates and correctional staff in US prisons have been documented to be at risk. Homeless shelters have also been identified as being at risk for COVID‐19 disease.
8
